description: Gets a list of tags associated with a specified resource. A rescore execution plan is an example of a resource that can have tags associated with it.

parameters.name: ResourceARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the rescore execution plan to get a list of tags for.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: A list of tags associated with the rescore execution plan.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key for the tag. Keys are not case sensitive and must be unique.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value associated with the tag. The value can be an empty string but it can't be null.
